com.netflix.genie.common.internal.dto.v4.converters

Class JobServiceProtoConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.common.internal.dto.v4.converters.JobServiceProtoConverter

  • public final class JobServiceProtoConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for converting proto messages for the JobServiceGrpc.JobServiceImplBase service to and from V4 DTO POJO's.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    See Also:
    com.netflix.genie.common.internal.dto.v4, com.netflix.genie.proto

      Extract the Execution Resource Criteria from the resolve job specification request.
      static JobSpecification toJobSpecificationDTO(com.netflix.genie.proto.JobSpecificationResponse response)
      Convert a response from server into a Job Specification DTO which can be used in the codebase free of gRPC.
